name: Lance Armstrong Foundation
overview: Lance Armstrong Foundation (LAF) provides information and tools, which promote the physical, psychological, social recovery, and care of cancer survivors and their families. The foundation offers community survivorship programs that inform cancer survivors, health care professionals, and the general public about survivorship issues and national advocacy initiatives, which address health policy issues to increase support and services for cancer survivors. Additionally, it provides scientific and clinical research grants that support research for better understanding of cancer survivorship and community programs, which aid in the development of after-treatment services and support for survivors. LAF was founded in 1997 and is based in Austin, Texas.

milestones.description: The Lance Armstrong Foundation Made $3 Million On The Demand Media IPO
